original_text: “As Your Majesty was lying there, your mind turned to things to come, and the revealer of mysteries showed you what is going to happen.
korean_text: 왕이여 왕이 침상에서 장래 일을 생각하실 때에 은밀한 것을 나타내시는 이가 장래 일을 왕에게 알게 하셨사오며

sentences.original_text: As Your Majesty was lying there
your mind turned to things to come
sentences.korean_translation: 왕의 마음이 장차 일어날 일들로 향했습니다

sentences.original_text: and the revealer of mysteries showed you
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 비밀을 나타내시는 분이 왕에게 보여주셨습니다
